Description: Secrets are buried in flesh and bone.
LevelDescriptionText: 1|It is all just a mass of entrails to you~4|You have learned how the Fading Haruspex performs her rituals~5|Patterns begin to emerge~3|Your stomach no longer jumps at the thought of divination~2|You have seen a spark of the truth
ChangeDescriptionText: 1|You are learning the ways of haruspicy.
Name: Gant Pole: An Apprenticeship in Haruspicy
